issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Something in the latest changes in euca2ools from today has broken {{euare-userdelcert}} and subsequently has taken out CI as well as we rely on it for cert management. {{euare-userlistcerts}} now contains more information as well. In prior euca2ools there was no user listed, in this case you can see "admin" You can see in the request that the parsed cert id is correct {{CertificateId: CIELTQVDOXSR7QXSD2WLI}} however when the request is made certificate is is set to "admin" {{CertificateId: admin}} there are 500 errors and in the end a {{java.util.NoSuchElementException}} is returned however the cert is actually deleted. {code} [root@d-20 ~]# euare-userlistcerts CIELTQVDOXSR7QXSD2WLI Active admin [root@d-20 ~]# for cert in `source eucarc && euare-userlistcerts | grep -v Active`;do source eucarc && euare-userdelcert -c $cert --debug; done 2015-01-21 21:24:05,517 DEBUG DeleteSigningCertificate parsed arguments: {'UserName': None, 'CertificateId': 'CIELTQVDOXSR7QXSD2WLI', 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'DelegateAccount': None, 'region': None, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2015-01-21 21:24:05,517 INFO Config finding global option default-region 2015-01-21 21:24:05,517 INFO Config novalue for default-region 2015-01-21 21:24:05,517 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-01-21 21:24:05,517 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-01-21 21:24:05,517 INFO Config finding global 'CIELTQVDOXSR7QXSD2WLI', 'Version': '2010-05-08'} 2015-01-21 21:24:05,521 INFO IAM sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2015-01-21 21:24:05,521 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'InternalFailure', 'java.util.NoSuchElementException: No com.eucalyptus.auth.entities.CertificateEntity with certificateId=admin') {code} I have verified that downgrading euca2ools I do not see the issue. {code} [root@d-20 ~]# yum downgrade euca2ools -y --nogpg Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, security Setting up Downgrade Process Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile * extras: comments.body: I saw that [~shaon] resolved this issue today?  Shaon, please comment prior to the scrub
Talked to [~gholms]. This issue was caused because of a fix done in TOOLS-542. Necessary fix for eucalyptus-cookbook and eutester has been pushed. Deploy jobs seems to be passing.
[~tony], any objection to closing this as "Not a Bug"? (error caused by a change in tool output and fixed by QA changes)
This was due to tool output changes and QA system has been updated to handle the new output.
